title: F/S - 1910 T210 Old Mill Series 1 - Bensen (Skydash Collection) SGC 40 - SOLD!

posts.post_title: F/S - 1910 T210 Old Mill Series 1 - Bensen (Skydash Collection) SGC 40 - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Very nice T210 Old Mill Series 1 card of Bensen, Columbus.  Card is graded by SGC 40 -VG and is part of the Skydash Collection.  Price is $55 (US addresses only) which includes shipping and insurance.    Payment through check, money order or PayPal F/F (or add 3%).  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].

Thanks!

Kevin
